'''Aguara''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

One copy of Aguara can be obtained talking to the Little Tepetlisaurus that appears in the [[Rest Area Entrance]] 2 daily resets after completing the {{Quest|Someday, We All Must Walk Alone}}.

==Trivia==
* Aguara hatches from the egg found during in the World Quest ''[[The Lone Isle Named Night]]''.
===Etymology===
* {{w|Aguara}} is a mythological fox in {{w|Eastern Bolivian Guaraní language|Ava Guaraní}} and {{w|Chané}} mythology.
